Dropbox Tip No. 1

  • « Previous
  • Next »

2010-07-05 00:00:00 +0200 by Peng Zhong

Want your Vim configuration on another computer? Add this line to your ~/.exrc file.

source ~/Dropbox/.exrc

Donâ€™t have a Dropbox account yet? Get your own now.
